forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 67. South southeast wind 2 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
